title: Explore Where We Operate
description: Tap any marker on the map to discover the story behind that event. Each marker clicked unlocks a snapshot of the venue, the experience we delivered, and the flavours we brought to life.
filter_label: Click to filter by an event type

map_venues.name: Stade Jean Bouin
map_venues.recent_event: Football - Paris FC vs Toulouse FC (Ligue 2)
map_venues.description: The Stade Jean Bouin is a multipurpose stadium in the 16th arrondissement of Paris, France. The 20,000 capacity facility serves as the home stadium for rugby union team Stade Français and the football club Paris FC.

map_venues.name: Groupama Stadium
map_venues.description: The Groupama Stadium is a stadium in Décines-Charpieu, a suburb of Lyon, France. It is the home ground of Ligue 1 club Olympique Lyonnais. With a seating capacity of 59,186, it is the third-largest football stadium in France.

map_venues.name: Stade Vélodrome
map_venues.description: The Stade Vélodrome is a multi-use stadium in Marseille, France. It is home to the Olympique de Marseille football club of Ligue 1. The stadium is the largest club ground in France and the second largest in the country.

map_venues.name: Hellfest
map_venues.description: Hellfest is a French rock and metal festival that takes place annually in Clisson. It is one of the largest music festivals in France and one of the biggest heavy metal festivals in Europe, attracting over 60,000 visitors daily.

map_venues.name: Accor Arena
map_venues.description: The Accor Arena, formerly known as Bercy Arena, is an indoor arena located in the 12th arrondissement of Paris. It hosts concerts, sports events, and shows, with a capacity of up to 20,300 spectators.

map_venues.name: Wembley Stadium
map_venues.recent_event: Football - England vs France (UEFA Nations League)
map_venues.description: Wembley Stadium is a football stadium in Wembley, London. It is the national stadium of England and serves as the home of the England national football team. With 90,000 seats, it is the largest stadium in the UK.
